underline.text: S[ed] iste scie[n]tie pure mathematice sunt p[ro]porcionate nostro intellectui cu[m] c[on]sidera[n]t pura abstracta s[ecundu]m ratione[m] a materia sensibili
positio[n]e q[ue] np[n] h[abet] positione[m] in co[n]tinuo Punct[us] aut[em] est substa[n]tia habe[n]s posit[i]o[n]e[m] i[n] c[on]tinuo [et] sic sup[er]addit vnitati
q[uod] c[on]sumpta naturali serie nu[m]eror[um]. om[n]ia vocabula sup[er]ficier[um] geometrie perieru[n]t
q[ua]re vident[ur] o[mn]ia geometricalia esse co[m]posita ex nu[m]eris simplicit[er] [et] magis
q[ua]re scie[n]tia ei[us] est in c[o]gnoscendo v[niversa]le [et] de
q[uod] in illo ergo in o[mn]i
